description.message: Window labels can be saved and opened all at once, switching between multiple windows can be realized, saving up to 99% of memory.

noResult.message: Please enter the window name first, and then click the "â†“" button to save the window

emptyGroupName.message: The window name cannot be empty

invalidGroupName.message: The window name is illegal, please modify it first

groupNameRepeat.message: Window name is not allowed to be repeated

changeConfirm.message: Are you sure to update the window

deleteConfirm.message: Are you sure to delete the window

clearDataExplain.message: Only Window Data will be deleted, and the Preference Data will not be affected

exportExplain.message: Except for the Preference Data of this plug-in, the rest of the data (ie Window Data) is only saved locally. If you log in on other devices, you can export the data first and then import on other devices.

addKeysExplain.message: Quickly start the program, improve the efficiency of use

resetConfirm.message: Are you sure to restore the default configuration?

clearDataConfirm.message: Are you sure to delete Window Data?

invalidFileFormat.message: It is not a valid file format

settingImportMessage.message: The file is loaded successfully, click the "Store" button to take effect
